title: Schedule Update
message: The MLK Parade Truth Sets Us Free coordination meeting time is now TBD. Please check back for updates.

title: Hotel Room Block Extended
message: Good news! The cutoff date for booking hotel rooms has been extended to December 30th, 2025. Room rate is $153 per night plus taxes.

title: Registration Now Open
message: Conference registration is now open! Please register as soon as possible to help us with planning. Child care registration is also available.
